column3: and the duck confit are insanely good. Love their use of arugula and cranberry in the duck confit
column4: tastes like a modified turkey dinner in a sandwich...the melting cheese is to die for. You can't go wrong with the crunchy chicken
column5: this sandwich is massive. The shrimp and blue crab is so fresh
column6: but the amount of dressing in the mix is sometimes overwhelming
column7: still good nonetheless. Get the kale
column9: and the mint lemonade/limeade as extras...very very very good!
